title: Common Graphic Library
description: Reusable vehicle primitives shared across FuncDraw demos.

catalogEntries.name: Wheel
catalogEntries.catalogSvg: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="-3 -3 6 6"><circle cx="0" cy="0" r="2.2" fill="#94a3b8" stroke="#0f172a" stroke-width="0.25"/><circle cx="0" cy="0" r="1.4" fill="#0f172a"/><circle cx="0" cy="0" r="0.5" fill="#e2e8f0"/></svg>
catalogEntries.descriptionHtml: Standalone wheel primitive that can be positioned within custom graphics.

catalogEntries.name: Complete Car
catalogEntries.catalogSvg: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="-12 -8 24 16"><rect x="-10" y="-3" width="20" height="6" fill="#38bdf8" stroke="#0f172a" stroke-width="0.4"/><rect x="-8" y="-5" width="16" height="2" fill="#1e293b"/><rect x="-9" y="-1" width="18" height="2" fill="#0f172a"/><circle cx="-5" cy="3" r="2.2" fill="#94a3b8" stroke="#0f172a" stroke-width="0.25"/><circle cx="5" cy="3" r="2.2" fill="#94a3b8" stroke="#0f172a" stroke-width="0.25"/><circle cx="-5" cy="3" r="1.4" fill="#0f172a"/><circle cx="5" cy="3" r="1.4" fill="#0f172a"/></svg>
catalogEntries.descriptionHtml: Body plus wheels, constructed from the wheel module for quick reuse.
